remarks: Rule used to change the first bound variable in an ordered pair abstraction, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Eric Schmidt, 4-Apr-2007.)
statement:
cbvopab1v.1 $e |- ( x = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvopab1v $p |- { <. x , y >. | ph } = { <. z , y >. | ps } $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
$d y z $.
